casebody.data:
STATE of NC
v.
KING. No. 581P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Edward W. Grannis, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of November 2004 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2005."
